content:
I'm thrilled to hear that! It's great that you're taking advantage of the coding bootcamp to learn and build your project. Implementing form validation and error messages will definitely enhance your project's user experience.

Remember, don't hesitate to reach out if you encounter any issues or have questions. I'm here to help. Good luck with your project, and I hope you have a fantastic time at the tech incubator!

Also, don't forget to celebrate your progress and accomplishments along the way. You're taking a huge step by building a project from scratch, and that's something to be proud of!

Keep coding, and I'll be here if you need me!
